mdRecord.dcterms:title: Hidden Hand, Faulds ad; 01 of 01
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 1. Historical InformationFaulds, Henry (Flyers for publications of Faulds, a speech transcript given by Faulds from the 11th Annual IAI Conference, and two copies of his book, A Manual of Practical Dactylography.)Printed flyer. Used as an advertisement and contains quoted Isis extract, in which exists a review and critique of The Hidden Hand, a pamphlet written by Faulds. See also item 010-140.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Faulds, Henry, 18431930
Fingerprints
